headline: Iron Mountain Inc (IRM) Q4 2024 Earnings Call Highlights: Record Growth and Strategic Challenges
summary: Iron Mountain Inc (IRM) reports double-digit growth in revenue and earnings, while navigating strategic shifts and market challenges.

headline: Why Iron Mountain Stock Plummeted by Over 7% on Thursday
summary: Iron Mountain (NYSE: IRM) didn't quite end its 2024 on a high note, at least as far as its fundamentals were concerned.  Iron Mountain, which specializes in the handling of documents and records, booked revenue of $1.58 billion for the quarter.  In the earnings release, Iron Mountain quoted its CEO William Meaney as saying that the quarter featured "strength across each of our business segments."
